thread.title: Spanish helicopter crash crew of 3 still missing in Atlantic
thread.title_full: Spanish helicopter crash crew of 3 still missing in Atlantic - US News

author: USNews
title: Spanish helicopter crash crew of 3 still missing in Atlantic
text:
Spanish helicopter crash crew of 3 still missing in Atlantic, not rescued after all Associated Press Oct. 24, 2015 | 6:52 a.m. EDT + More MADRID (AP) â€” Spain's defense minister has acknowledged that his ministry wrongly reported that three crew members of a military helicopter that crashed into the Atlantic Ocean had been rescued. He now says all three are still missing.
Speaking late Friday at a press conference at an air force base in the Canary Islands, Pedro Morenes said a message received from Moroccan forces had been mistakenly understood to mean the crew had been rescued.
He blames a "distortion of information" for causing a lamentable state of uncertainty and confusion.
The helicopter ditched Thursday about 280 nautical miles (519 kilometers/320 miles) from its destination on the Spanish island of Gran Canaria having set off from Mauritania.
